Job Description

Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue exceeding $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, improving patient diagnostics and therapies, or increasing efficiency in their laboratories, we are here to support them. Our distributed team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services and Patheon. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.

  • The Position
  • In this key role you will be directly responsible for the Firmware design and development of Laboratory equipment design and manufactures at our facility in Singapore. You will be working closely with, and learning from, best-in-class Marketing, collaborate with Project Management, Operations, multi-functional engineering, and scientific teams of a diverse group of backgrounds.

Key Responsibilities

  • Responsible for architecting and implementing software for TI MSP430 series and NXP ARM series Microcontrollers.
  • Embedded C/C++ programming and coding for Embedded system.
  • Implement programme for testing.
  • Driver Development.
  • Determining and implementing efficient coding process and procedure.
  • Responsible for Software design and related documentation.

Requirements:

  • Possess a Masters/Bachelor Degree in Software engineering .

  • Expert in Designing Embedded Software Architecture in FreeRTOS (Real Time Operating System) Platform with 5 years of experience.

    - Experience in Low level driver development ( Eg: I2C, SPI, UART, USB, Ethernet

    Drivers ).

    • Expert in Embedded C/C++ (object oriented) programming.

    - Experience in Embedded product development with GUI (Graphical User Interface) and Touchscreen

    - Experience in Unit testing and Integration testing.

    - Experience in working with IDEs like ARM KEIL/IAR

    - Familiarity with Software Version control tools like GitHub/SVN
  • Experienced in providing technical leadership.
  • Experience in developing requirements, verification and validation plans and risk analysis.

We seek candidates who take initiative, are driven, self-confident and conceptual problem solvers. You are someone who combines excellent communication skills with strong collaboration skills, easily switching between thinking on a high/conceptual level and to a detail level.

You have perseverance, are conclusive and target driven with a quality-, cost- and time-focus. You combine a strong analytical view with a pragmatic approach and can flex yourself in a sophisticated product development environment. You are value oriented and able to set and act according to priorities at the same time.

Join Us
Apart from strong benefits and salary conditions, we encourage candidates that enjoy working in a diverse, multi-cultural, multi-disciplinary, innovative technology environment where personal development and team collaboration are key to success! Diversity in our teams are an important element to create an effective and challenging working environment. Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement are key characteristics that we expect of all that are part of our community.

Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Senior Technical Content Developer on our Content Engineering and Translation team in Singapore.

Ground-breaking products deserve to be accompanied by world-class technical information. Dell customers expect nothing less. That’s where our Technical Content Development team comes in. Working side-by-side with engineers, editors and illustrators, subject matter experts and stakeholders, the team creates clear, concise and easy-to-understand content for multiple channels. It takes an ability to research, analyze and synthesize complex subject matter. And it’s all underpinned by an understanding of how our technologies work and how they benefit customers.

Are you keen to work in a dynamic content development environment where you can bring in your innovative ideas and work cross-functionally to develop first-class solution papers that incorporate engineering and technical marketing ideas and content in one comprehensive paper that will sell Dell Technologies products and solutions?


What you’ll achieve
We are looking for a Senior Technical Content Developer to join us in Singapore and work with our engineering, technical marketing, and program management teams to accelerate the growth of our products and solutions.

You will:

  • Contributes to planning and overall design of technical information, including installation, operation and maintenance instructions, and other types of technical content such as video scripts, blog posts, flowcharts, technical advisories, and release notes.

  • Works with editors, incorporating editorial feedback to ensure that company style and standards are appropriately expressed in technical content and media.Publishes content to a variety of outputs, including PDF documents, web pages, blog articles, wikis, videos, and online help systems.

  • Exercises considerable latitude in determining technical objectives for content development. Leverages a variety of information sources including: bug comments, whiteboard discussions, community forums, knowledge transfer, third-party website and original equipment manufacturer (OEM) content.

  • Proposes product design and process improvements, coordinates, and executes content development and user experience plans.Exerts sphere of influence cross-functionally, represents the organization on project teams, and assumes technical project leadership roles while fostering collaboration within and across work groups.


Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements

  • 5 years+ experience in technical writing in a high-tech industry, particularly experience with micro services, Edge computing, Kubernetes, NFV, virtualization, Open Stack, VMware, network operations, and Agile scrum

  • Knowledge of industry standards such as DITA, XML, and HTML Knowledge of job related content authoring, publishing, and graphic design tools. Possesses strong technical writing skills and familiarity with technical content development, design, and UX strategies and methodologies

  • Ability to establish content strategy, content governance, and UX standards within and across work groups and creates content plans that include user stories.Understands best practices for content development, design, and user experience within a given software development environment such as Agile.

  • Ability to evaluate technical content against UX benchmarks and user information requirements.Experience in managing content development activities in localization/internationalization projects.


Desirable Requirements

  • Understands Edge computing, UX workflows, virtualization, networking operations, container solutions, microservices, agile development, and dev ops


Who we are

We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.

Application closing date: 4 Nov 2023

Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.

Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture

At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered.

We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.

Principal Cloud Native Architect

When our customers are looking for IT consulting expertise, where else would they turn but to the company driving human progress through technology? Our Solutions Architecture team within Professional Services are experts in package customization and integration as well as total, end-to-end solutions in targeted industry segments. After thorough consultation with our customers and careful analysis, we develop new IT systems or replace existing systems that support customers’ strategic, operational and financial goals.

Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Principal Cloud Native Architect on our Cloud Native Center of Excellence in Singapore.

What you’ll achieve

An opportunity to work for a company whose software is utilized by every Fortune 500 company and significantly impacts every industry. You will be a part of a collaborative environment whose teams care about the product they are creating, how they create it, and the impact it has on customers’ business objectives. More importantly, you drive the opportunity to collaborate and work interactively with our clients to ensure their successful deployment of the Kubernetes platform on-premise or cloud IaaS.

Success in the Role: What are the performance goals over the first 6-12 months you will work toward completing?

  • Provide technical direction for the development, and design of Cloud Native architectures, standards, and implementation approaches and systems integration for client engagement and product/ solution development from the definition phase through implementation.

  • As a member of the Cloud Native Architecture group, you will be expected to work with and contribute to its Kubernetes-based microservices architecture, and all your deliverables must align with the group’s development and deployment standards.

  • Demonstrate leadership in IT management by producing strategic and innovative concept proposals, and papers, and speaking at conferences.

What type of work will you be doing? What assignments, requirements, or skills will you be performing on a regular basis?

  • Recognize system deficiencies and implement effective solutions.

  • Communicate and enforce best practices for building and running applications on Kubernetes

  • Continually seeks opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.

  • Manages client interactions and expectations regarding architectures.

  • Organizing tech talks and participating in meetups/events.

Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements

  • Experienced Software Enterprise Architect with demonstrated skills in designing PaaS solutions, enterprise middleware, and Java Spring microservices based mission-critical applications.

  • Understands complex enterprise, cloud-based concepts and effectively employs different design techniques; A clear understanding of cloud service and deployment models.

  • Experience with more than one relational database management systems; Understands the benefits and ideal uses of various programming languages.

  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to engage with Senior level leaders.

  • Ability to travel and work on-site with customers and partners.

Desirable Requirements

  • 8 years of experience as an enterprise architect.

  • Experience with various public clouds & Kubernetes.

Who we are

We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.

Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Responsibilities
  • Working as part of the Firewall Team, this Firewall Team Lead team will be required to lead a team of 5-6 firewall engineers and provide guidance for the team to develop both technical and soft skill.
  • Provide the firewall strategy for the bank and ensure secure, stable, and scalable design.
  • Automate the firewall policy management and streamline the existing process.
  • Assists Level 2/3 Support Engineers during problem determination and resolution and be the escalation point of all firewall issue.
  • Evaluate and define the global standard of firewall hardware and software version to standardise the global infrastructure.
  • Manage the firewall vendors to design, architect and operate the firewall infrastructure to provide stable production environment.
  • Coordinate with information security governance team to align IT infrastructure with established standards.
  • Ensures system compliance with all established information security policies
  • Performs technical assessment of any non-well defined or complex firewall change requests prior to implementation.
  • Create firewall reporting by using Algosec in regular base to clean-up the unused objects.
  • Performs regular review, edit and create of firewall Rulebase and recommend necessary optimization actions.
  • Planning and recommending overall improvements in firewall management including the capacity planning to avoid any potential issue.
  • Advanced troubleshooting production problems with RCA and fault diagnosis
  • Implements changes to firewall infrastructure hardware to correct errors or enhance functionality
  • Develops processes for improving operational efficiencies, as well as identifies/implements automation tools for existing manual processes.
  • Prepares technical reports, memoranda, and instructional manuals as documentation of network design and operational requirements.
  • Ready to work shifts including public holidays
Requirements
  • Good experience in firewall operations, in lead or management capacity. Hands-on on firewall management and strong leadership role in managing firewall infrastructure of banking critical environment.
  • Bachelor's degree in engineering or science
  • Certification: CCSA, CCSE, CCIE, PCNSE, NSE4 and ITIL Foundation (Preferred but not mandatory)
  • Have a solid understanding of Checkpoint Firewalls, Palo Alto and FortiGate firewalls technologies.
  • Having strong understanding of the L3 routing on the firewall is preferred, like OSPF and BGP.
  • Strong verbal, written, interpersonal communications skills.
  • Ability to work independently or as a team player.
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Who We Are


As a member of our team, you will be exposed to the world of blockchain, cryptocurrency, all things X-to-Earn, and other projects in Web 3.0. Our project is backed by some of the most respectable and connected investors, advisors and partners in the blockchain space and we're growing our family!

Job Brief

We are looking for a Software Engineer/ Dev Ops Specialist to help build, and support our product & engineering team .

The main purpose of this role is to ensure there is consistent progress and that timelines are being met for our software applications, as well as to lead the development team to improve efficiency and quality.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with development teams to design and implement deployment processes and infrastructure that support the delivery of high-quality software
  • Implement and operate highly scalable, robust, distributed systems on cloud
  • Monitor and troubleshoot issues with the technology infrastructure and applications, and implement solutions to prevent future problems
  • Contribute to the design and implementation of new features and improvements to our software applications

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 3+ years of experience in a similar role
  • Experience writing code as a software engineer in Javascript / Python, with a focus on DevOps
  • Strong knowledge of Linux and shell scripting
  • Experience with automation tools: Ansible, Puppet, Chef, Terraform etc.
  • Experience in administering CI/CD tools such as Git, Jira, GitLab, or Jenkins
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to work well in a team environment

Bonus Points

  • Understanding of blockchain programming languages is a plus
  • Experience in the Web3 space.

Job Description
The role will collaborate closely with key stakeholders for SG BU IT systems (SingPost Mobile, POPStop PUDO app, Payment Gateway Interface with SG Locate, ez2ship, Pay With SAM, eSAM Kiosk & Shop@Post) to understand business requirements and work closely with IS vendors/partners in getting solutions and changes implemented. He/She will translate business requirements into designs and actionable plans. He/She perform application development, consolidate progress and report to team manager to ensure timely desired outcomes. He/She will also be supporting the business users to investigate, troubleshoot, and resolve issue during application testing phase.
The main responsibilities of this role include but not limited to:
  • Serve as a technical lead contributing to and directing the efforts of development teams, including internal and external team members.
  • Fully accountable for all aspects of the Product under your charge; delivering value through application of IT products in the business
  • Take complete end-to-end technical & engineering ownership of one or more applications / product features.
  • Contribute to the ongoing evolution of the existing content supply portfolio of applications and services.
  • Design, develop, modify, implement, and support software components anywhere in the software stack.
  • Determine root cause for the most complex software issues and develop practical, efficient, and permanent technical solutions.
  • Remain current on new technologies and available vendor packages; evaluate and make recommendations as necessary.
  • Assist in task planning, estimation, scheduling, and staffing.
  • Mentor JO Software Developer to allow for skill/knowledge development through advice, coaching, and training opportunities.
  • Frequent code review and ensure the coding are done as per the standards.
  • Work closely with the various Business and IT stakeholders to deliver projects, enhancements and day-to-day BAU activities.
  • Execute Systems Unit Testing and Systems Integration Testing based on Test Cases.
  • Undertake any other duties that may be assigned by the supervisors.
  • Participate in the Agile process including stand-up meetings, sprint planning, reviews and retrospectives.
  • Operations and L2 support work after hours may be needed from time to time. This will be kept to a minimum and shared across the team to ensure a sustainable work/life balance.
Requirements
  • Bachelor Degree in IT / Computer Science or related disciplines
  • At least 5+ years of relevant working experience in development, testing, implementation and post-implementation maintenance support;
  • Mandatory Experience in the development of APIs and any other System Interfaces;
  • Mandatory Experience with RDBMS, Cloud Solutions, RDS and preferably with experience or knowledge on MySQL;
  • Essential Expertise in RESTful/SOAP APIs and familiar with XML, JSON and WebHooks;
  • Preferably with prior experience on mobile app development, Online/Mobile Payments, front end web application and related software applications;
  • Experience in managing multiple concurrent initiatives.

• Collaborate with software development teams to understand database requirements and optimize data storage and retrieval processes.
  • Design, develop, and implement database solutions using SQL programming and related technologies.
  • Write efficient and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to meet application requirements.
  • Develop and maintain database schemas, tables, and relationships to ensure data integrity and consistency.
  • Participate in performance tuning and optimization of database systems for improved speed and efficiency.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve database-related issues, such as data inconsistencies, performance bottlenecks, and system failures.
  • Collaborate with Data Architects to ensure that database designs align with overall data architecture and best practices.
  • Implement security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations.
  • Work closely with QA teams to validate and verify data accuracy and quality.
  • Stay current with industry trends and emerging database technologies to suggest improvements and innovations.
  • Provide technical guidance and support to development teams regarding database-related matters.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Proven experience as an SQL Software Developer or a similar role.
  • Proficiency in SQL programming and strong knowledge of relational database concepts.
  • Experience with database management systems such as Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.
  • Ability to write efficient and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions.
  • Familiarity with database design principles and normalization.
  • Knowledge of database performance optimization techniques.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Understanding of data security and compliance requirements.
  • Experience with data migration and ETL processes is a plus.
  • Familiarity with NoSQL databases is a plus.
  • Knowledge of version control systems such as Git is a plus.
  • Previous experience in software development is a plus.

Job Summary:

Seeking a highly talent Software Engineer for a Financial MNC to collaborate with technology and strategy teams across the firm to build high quality, secure, and maintainable systems using approved tools and software development practices. Manage relationship and workflows with multiple stakeholders and enhance business understanding in a cross-product role. This role will allow you to work alongside talented engineers to enhance your technology skills working on cutting edge system.

Requirements:
  • 2-3 years' experience with backend Java or Python.
  • Experience with JavaScript based web development e.g. Angular / ReactJS
  • Proven track record in designing and implementing Real time distributed processing systems and event processing architecture.
  • Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms and designing for performance and resiliency
  • Demonstrates strong oral, written, and presentation skills.
  • Experience in BigData processing platform/tools like Hadoop and Spark is preferred.
  • Focus on software quality - ability to write clean code and encourage others to do so
  • Experience with near real time transactional systems with NoSQL databases (Kafka, Elastic Search)
  • Experience in BPMN and user workflow based systems is preferred
  • Good knowledge of testing frameworks (JUnit/Testing/Fitnesse) and concepts (Test Driven Development, Regression and Parametric Testing)
  • Able to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously and executes projects independently.

Job Description

Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue exceeding $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, improving patient diagnostics and therapies, or increasing efficiency in their laboratories, we are here to support them. Our distributed team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services and Patheon. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.

  • The Position
  • In this key role you will be directly responsible for the Firmware design and development of Laboratory equipment design and manufactures at our facility in Singapore. You will be working closely with, and learning from, best-in-class Marketing, collaborate with Project Management, Operations, multi-functional engineering, and scientific teams of a diverse group of backgrounds.

Key Responsibilities

  • Responsible for architecting and implementing software for TI MSP430 series and NXP ARM series Microcontrollers.
  • Embedded C/C++ programming and coding for Embedded system.
  • Implement programme for testing.
  • Driver Development.
  • Determining and implementing efficient coding process and procedure.
  • Responsible for Software design and related documentation.

Requirements:

  • Possess a Masters/Bachelor Degree in Software engineering .

  • Expert in Designing Embedded Software Architecture in FreeRTOS (Real Time Operating System) Platform with 5 years of experience.

    - Experience in Low level driver development ( Eg: I2C, SPI, UART, USB, Ethernet

    Drivers ).

    • Expert in Embedded C/C++ (object oriented) programming.

    - Experience in Embedded product development with GUI (Graphical User Interface) and Touchscreen

    - Experience in Unit testing and Integration testing.

    - Experience in working with IDEs like ARM KEIL/IAR

    - Familiarity with Software Version control tools like GitHub/SVN
  • Experienced in providing technical leadership.
  • Experience in developing requirements, verification and validation plans and risk analysis.

We seek candidates who take initiative, are driven, self-confident and conceptual problem solvers. You are someone who combines excellent communication skills with strong collaboration skills, easily switching between thinking on a high/conceptual level and to a detail level.

You have perseverance, are conclusive and target driven with a quality-, cost- and time-focus. You combine a strong analytical view with a pragmatic approach and can flex yourself in a sophisticated product development environment. You are value oriented and able to set and act according to priorities at the same time.

Join Us
Apart from strong benefits and salary conditions, we encourage candidates that enjoy working in a diverse, multi-cultural, multi-disciplinary, innovative technology environment where personal development and team collaboration are key to success! Diversity in our teams are an important element to create an effective and challenging working environment. Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement are key characteristics that we expect of all that are part of our community.

Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Senior Technical Content Developer on our Content Engineering and Translation team in Singapore.

Ground-breaking products deserve to be accompanied by world-class technical information. Dell customers expect nothing less. That’s where our Technical Content Development team comes in. Working side-by-side with engineers, editors and illustrators, subject matter experts and stakeholders, the team creates clear, concise and easy-to-understand content for multiple channels. It takes an ability to research, analyze and synthesize complex subject matter. And it’s all underpinned by an understanding of how our technologies work and how they benefit customers.

Are you keen to work in a dynamic content development environment where you can bring in your innovative ideas and work cross-functionally to develop first-class solution papers that incorporate engineering and technical marketing ideas and content in one comprehensive paper that will sell Dell Technologies products and solutions?


What you’ll achieve
We are looking for a Senior Technical Content Developer to join us in Singapore and work with our engineering, technical marketing, and program management teams to accelerate the growth of our products and solutions.

You will:

  • Contributes to planning and overall design of technical information, including installation, operation and maintenance instructions, and other types of technical content such as video scripts, blog posts, flowcharts, technical advisories, and release notes.

  • Works with editors, incorporating editorial feedback to ensure that company style and standards are appropriately expressed in technical content and media.Publishes content to a variety of outputs, including PDF documents, web pages, blog articles, wikis, videos, and online help systems.

  • Exercises considerable latitude in determining technical objectives for content development. Leverages a variety of information sources including: bug comments, whiteboard discussions, community forums, knowledge transfer, third-party website and original equipment manufacturer (OEM) content.

  • Proposes product design and process improvements, coordinates, and executes content development and user experience plans.Exerts sphere of influence cross-functionally, represents the organization on project teams, and assumes technical project leadership roles while fostering collaboration within and across work groups.


Take the first step towards your dream career

Essential Requirements

  • Knowledge of industry standards such as DITA, XML, and HTML Knowledge of job related content authoring, publishing, and graphic design tools. Possesses strong technical writing skills and familiarity with technical content development, design, and UX strategies and methodologies

  • Ability to establish content strategy, content governance, and UX standards within and across work groups and creates content plans that include user stories.Understands best practices for content development, design, and user experience within a given software development environment such as Agile.

  • Ability to evaluate technical content against UX benchmarks and user information requirements.Experience in managing content development activities in localization/internationalization projects.


Desirable Requirements

  • Understands Edge computing, UX workflows, virtualization, networking operations, container solutions, microservices, agile development, and dev ops


Who we are

We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.

Sales Engineer [ Machine Vision, AI & Robotics ]

Report to Sales Manager

Principal Cloud Native Architect

When our customers are looking for IT consulting expertise, where else would they turn but to the company driving human progress through technology? Our Solutions Architecture team within Professional Services are experts in package customization and integration as well as total, end-to-end solutions in targeted industry segments. After thorough consultation with our customers and careful analysis, we develop new IT systems or replace existing systems that support customers’ strategic, operational and financial goals.

Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Principal Cloud Native Architect on our Cloud Native Center of Excellence in Singapore.

What you’ll achieve

An opportunity to work for a company whose software is utilized by every Fortune 500 company and significantly impacts every industry. You will be a part of a collaborative environment whose teams care about the product they are creating, how they create it, and the impact it has on customers’ business objectives. More importantly, you drive the opportunity to collaborate and work interactively with our clients to ensure their successful deployment of the Kubernetes platform on-premise or cloud IaaS.

Success in the Role: What are the performance goals over the first 6-12 months you will work toward completing?

  • Provide technical direction for the development, and design of Cloud Native architectures, standards, and implementation approaches and systems integration for client engagement and product/ solution development from the definition phase through implementation.

  • As a member of the Cloud Native Architecture group, you will be expected to work with and contribute to its Kubernetes-based microservices architecture, and all your deliverables must align with the group’s development and deployment standards.

  • Demonstrate leadership in IT management by producing strategic and innovative concept proposals, and papers, and speaking at conferences.

What type of work will you be doing? What assignments, requirements, or skills will you be performing on a regular basis?

  • Recognize system deficiencies and implement effective solutions.

  • Communicate and enforce best practices for building and running applications on Kubernetes

  • Continually seeks opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.

  • Manages client interactions and expectations regarding architectures.

  • Organizing tech talks and participating in meetups/events.

Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements

  • Experienced Software Enterprise Architect with demonstrated skills in designing PaaS solutions, enterprise middleware, and Java Spring microservices based mission-critical applications.

  • Understands complex enterprise, cloud-based concepts and effectively employs different design techniques; A clear understanding of cloud service and deployment models.

  • Experience with more than one relational database management systems; Understands the benefits and ideal uses of various programming languages.

  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to engage with Senior level leaders.

  • Ability to travel and work on-site with customers and partners.

Desirable Requirements

  • 8 years of experience as an enterprise architect.

  • Experience with various public clouds & Kubernetes.

Who we are

We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.

Application closing date: 31 August 2023

Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.

Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture

At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered.

We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.

Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Responsibilities
  • Working as part of the Firewall Team, this Firewall Team Lead team will be required to lead a team of 5-6 firewall engineers and provide guidance for the team to develop both technical and soft skill.
  • Provide the firewall strategy for the bank and ensure secure, stable, and scalable design.
  • Automate the firewall policy management and streamline the existing process.
  • Assists Level 2/3 Support Engineers during problem determination and resolution and be the escalation point of all firewall issue.
  • Evaluate and define the global standard of firewall hardware and software version to standardise the global infrastructure.
  • Manage the firewall vendors to design, architect and operate the firewall infrastructure to provide stable production environment.
  • Coordinate with information security governance team to align IT infrastructure with established standards.
  • Ensures system compliance with all established information security policies
  • Performs technical assessment of any non-well defined or complex firewall change requests prior to implementation.
  • Create firewall reporting by using Algosec in regular base to clean-up the unused objects.
  • Performs regular review, edit and create of firewall Rulebase and recommend necessary optimization actions.
  • Planning and recommending overall improvements in firewall management including the capacity planning to avoid any potential issue.
  • Advanced troubleshooting production problems with RCA and fault diagnosis
  • Implements changes to firewall infrastructure hardware to correct errors or enhance functionality
  • Develops processes for improving operational efficiencies, as well as identifies/implements automation tools for existing manual processes.
  • Prepares technical reports, memoranda, and instructional manuals as documentation of network design and operational requirements.
  • Ready to work shifts including public holidays
Requirements
  • Good experience in firewall operations, in lead or management capacity. Hands-on on firewall management and strong leadership role in managing firewall infrastructure of banking critical environment.
  • Bachelor's degree in engineering or science
  • Certification: CCSA, CCSE, CCIE, PCNSE, NSE4 and ITIL Foundation (Preferred but not mandatory)
  • Have a solid understanding of Checkpoint Firewalls, Palo Alto and FortiGate firewalls technologies.
  • Having strong understanding of the L3 routing on the firewall is preferred, like OSPF and BGP.
  • Strong verbal, written, interpersonal communications skills.
  • Ability to work independently or as a team player.
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column2:
Who We Are


As a member of our team, you will be exposed to the world of blockchain, cryptocurrency, all things X-to-Earn, and other projects in Web 3.0. Our project is backed by some of the most respectable and connected investors, advisors and partners in the blockchain space and we're growing our family!

Job Brief

We are looking for a Software Engineer/ Dev Ops Specialist to help build, and support our product & engineering team .

The main purpose of this role is to ensure there is consistent progress and that timelines are being met for our software applications, as well as to lead the development team to improve efficiency and quality.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with development teams to design and implement deployment processes and infrastructure that support the delivery of high-quality software
  • Implement and operate highly scalable, robust, distributed systems on cloud
  • Monitor and troubleshoot issues with the technology infrastructure and applications, and implement solutions to prevent future problems
  • Contribute to the design and implementation of new features and improvements to our software applications

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 3+ years of experience in a similar role
  • Experience writing code as a software engineer in Javascript / Python, with a focus on DevOps
  • Strong knowledge of Linux and shell scripting
  • Experience with automation tools: Ansible, Puppet, Chef, Terraform etc.
  • Experience in administering CI/CD tools such as Git, Jira, GitLab, or Jenkins
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to work well in a team environment

Bonus Points

  • Understanding of blockchain programming languages is a plus
  • Experience in the Web3 space.

Job Description
The role will collaborate closely with key stakeholders for SG BU IT systems (SingPost Mobile, POPStop PUDO app, Payment Gateway Interface with SG Locate, ez2ship, Pay With SAM, eSAM Kiosk & Shop@Post) to understand business requirements and work closely with IS vendors/partners in getting solutions and changes implemented. He/She will translate business requirements into designs and actionable plans. He/She perform application development, consolidate progress and report to team manager to ensure timely desired outcomes. He/She will also be supporting the business users to investigate, troubleshoot, and resolve issue during application testing phase.
The main responsibilities of this role include but not limited to:
  • Serve as a technical lead contributing to and directing the efforts of development teams, including internal and external team members.
  • Fully accountable for all aspects of the Product under your charge; delivering value through application of IT products in the business
  • Take complete end-to-end technical & engineering ownership of one or more applications / product features.
  • Contribute to the ongoing evolution of the existing content supply portfolio of applications and services.
  • Design, develop, modify, implement, and support software components anywhere in the software stack.
  • Determine root cause for the most complex software issues and develop practical, efficient, and permanent technical solutions.
  • Remain current on new technologies and available vendor packages; evaluate and make recommendations as necessary.
  • Assist in task planning, estimation, scheduling, and staffing.
  • Mentor JO Software Developer to allow for skill/knowledge development through advice, coaching, and training opportunities.
  • Frequent code review and ensure the coding are done as per the standards.
  • Work closely with the various Business and IT stakeholders to deliver projects, enhancements and day-to-day BAU activities.
  • Execute Systems Unit Testing and Systems Integration Testing based on Test Cases.
  • Undertake any other duties that may be assigned by the supervisors.
  • Participate in the Agile process including stand-up meetings, sprint planning, reviews and retrospectives.
  • Operations and L2 support work after hours may be needed from time to time. This will be kept to a minimum and shared across the team to ensure a sustainable work/life balance.
Requirements
  • Bachelor Degree in IT / Computer Science or related disciplines
  • At least 5+ years of relevant working experience in development, testing, implementation and post-implementation maintenance support;
  • Mandatory Experience in the development of APIs and any other System Interfaces;
  • Mandatory Experience with RDBMS, Cloud Solutions, RDS and preferably with experience or knowledge on MySQL;
  • Essential Expertise in RESTful/SOAP APIs and familiar with XML, JSON and WebHooks;
  • Preferably with prior experience on mobile app development, Online/Mobile Payments, front end web application and related software applications;
  • Experience in managing multiple concurrent initiatives.

• Collaborate with software development teams to understand database requirements and optimize data storage and retrieval processes.
  • Design, develop, and implement database solutions using SQL programming and related technologies.
  • Write efficient and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to meet application requirements.
  • Develop and maintain database schemas, tables, and relationships to ensure data integrity and consistency.
  • Participate in performance tuning and optimization of database systems for improved speed and efficiency.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve database-related issues, such as data inconsistencies, performance bottlenecks, and system failures.
  • Collaborate with Data Architects to ensure that database designs align with overall data architecture and best practices.
  • Implement security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations.
  • Work closely with QA teams to validate and verify data accuracy and quality.
  • Stay current with industry trends and emerging database technologies to suggest improvements and innovations.
  • Provide technical guidance and support to development teams regarding database-related matters.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Proven experience as an SQL Software Developer or a similar role.
  • Proficiency in SQL programming and strong knowledge of relational database concepts.
  • Experience with database management systems such as Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.
  • Ability to write efficient and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions.
  • Familiarity with database design principles and normalization.
  • Knowledge of database performance optimization techniques.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Understanding of data security and compliance requirements.
  • Experience with data migration and ETL processes is a plus.
  • Familiarity with NoSQL databases is a plus.
  • Knowledge of version control systems such as Git is a plus.
  • Previous experience in software development is a plus.

Job Summary:

Seeking a highly talent Software Engineer for a Financial MNC to collaborate with technology and strategy teams across the firm to build high quality, secure, and maintainable systems using approved tools and software development practices. Manage relationship and workflows with multiple stakeholders and enhance business understanding in a cross-product role. This role will allow you to work alongside talented engineers to enhance your technology skills working on cutting edge system.

Requirements:
  • 2-3 years' experience with backend Java or Python.
  • Experience with JavaScript based web development e.g. Angular / ReactJS
  • Proven track record in designing and implementing Real time distributed processing systems and event processing architecture.
  • Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms and designing for performance and resiliency
  • Demonstrates strong oral, written, and presentation skills.
  • Experience in BigData processing platform/tools like Hadoop and Spark is preferred.
  • Focus on software quality - ability to write clean code and encourage others to do so
  • Experience with near real time transactional systems with NoSQL databases (Kafka, Elastic Search)
  • Experience in BPMN and user workflow based systems is preferred
  • Good knowledge of testing frameworks (JUnit/Testing/Fitnesse) and concepts (Test Driven Development, Regression and Parametric Testing)
  • Able to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously and executes projects independently.

We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified / contacted.

For more information you can email Marshall Tan in our Singapore office on marshall.tan@teksystems.com quoting Job Reference Marshall Tan 539966 or alternatively, apply here to register your interest.

Job Description

Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue exceeding $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, improving patient diagnostics and therapies, or increasing efficiency in their laboratories, we are here to support them. Our distributed team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services and Patheon. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.

  • The Position
  • In this key role you will be directly responsible for the Firmware design and development of Laboratory equipment design and manufactures at our facility in Singapore. You will be working closely with, and learning from, best-in-class Marketing, collaborate with Project Management, Operations, multi-functional engineering, and scientific teams of a diverse group of backgrounds.

Key Responsibilities

  • Responsible for architecting and implementing software for TI MSP430 series and NXP ARM series Microcontrollers.
  • Embedded C/C++ programming and coding for Embedded system.
  • Implement programme for testing.
  • Driver Development.
  • Determining and implementing efficient coding process and procedure.
  • Responsible for Software design and related documentation.

Requirements:

  • Possess a Masters/Bachelor Degree in Software engineering .

  • Expert in Designing Embedded Software Architecture in FreeRTOS (Real Time Operating System) Platform with 5 years of experience.

    - Experience in Low level driver development ( Eg: I2C, SPI, UART, USB, Ethernet

    Drivers ).

    • Expert in Embedded C/C++ (object oriented) programming.

    - Experience in Embedded product development with GUI (Graphical User Interface) and Touchscreen

    - Experience in Unit testing and Integration testing.

    - Experience in working with IDEs like ARM KEIL/IAR

    - Familiarity with Software Version control tools like GitHub/SVN
  • Experienced in providing technical leadership.
  • Experience in developing requirements, verification and validation plans and risk analysis.

We seek candidates who take initiative, are driven, self-confident and conceptual problem solvers. You are someone who combines excellent communication skills with strong collaboration skills, easily switching between thinking on a high/conceptual level and to a detail level.

You have perseverance, are conclusive and target driven with a quality-, cost- and time-focus. You combine a strong analytical view with a pragmatic approach and can flex yourself in a sophisticated product development environment. You are value oriented and able to set and act according to priorities at the same time.

Join Us
Apart from strong benefits and salary conditions, we encourage candidates that enjoy working in a diverse, multi-cultural, multi-disciplinary, innovative technology environment where personal development and team collaboration are key to success! Diversity in our teams are an important element to create an effective and challenging working environment. Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement are key characteristics that we expect of all that are part of our community.

Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Senior Technical Content Developer on our Content Engineering and Translation team in Singapore.

Ground-breaking products deserve to be accompanied by world-class technical information. Dell customers expect nothing less. That’s where our Technical Content Development team comes in. Working side-by-side with engineers, editors and illustrators, subject matter experts and stakeholders, the team creates clear, concise and easy-to-understand content for multiple channels. It takes an ability to research, analyze and synthesize complex subject matter. And it’s all underpinned by an understanding of how our technologies work and how they benefit customers.

Are you keen to work in a dynamic content development environment where you can bring in your innovative ideas and work cross-functionally to develop first-class solution papers that incorporate engineering and technical marketing ideas and content in one comprehensive paper that will sell Dell Technologies products and solutions?


What you’ll achieve
We are looking for a Senior Technical Content Developer to join us in Singapore and work with our engineering, technical marketing, and program management teams to accelerate the growth of our products and solutions.

You will:

  • Contributes to planning and overall design of technical information, including installation, operation and maintenance instructions, and other types of technical content such as video scripts, blog posts, flowcharts, technical advisories, and release notes.

  • Works with editors, incorporating editorial feedback to ensure that company style and standards are appropriately expressed in technical content and media.Publishes content to a variety of outputs, including PDF documents, web pages, blog articles, wikis, videos, and online help systems.

  • Exercises considerable latitude in determining technical objectives for content development. Leverages a variety of information sources including: bug comments, whiteboard discussions, community forums, knowledge transfer, third-party website and original equipment manufacturer (OEM) content.

  • Proposes product design and process improvements, coordinates, and executes content development and user experience plans.Exerts sphere of influence cross-functionally, represents the organization on project teams, and assumes technical project leadership roles while fostering collaboration within and across work groups.


Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements

  • 5 years+ experience in technical writing in a high-tech industry, particularly experience with micro services, Edge computing, Kubernetes, NFV, virtualization, Open Stack, VMware, network operations, and Agile scrum

  • Knowledge of industry standards such as DITA, XML, and HTML Knowledge of job related content authoring, publishing, and graphic design tools. Possesses strong technical writing skills and familiarity with technical content development, design, and UX strategies and methodologies

  • Ability to establish content strategy, content governance, and UX standards within and across work groups and creates content plans that include user stories.Understands best practices for content development, design, and user experience within a given software development environment such as Agile.

  • Ability to evaluate technical content against UX benchmarks and user information requirements.Experience in managing content development activities in localization/internationalization projects.


Desirable Requirements

  • Understands Edge computing, UX workflows, virtualization, networking operations, container solutions, microservices, agile development, and dev ops


Who we are

We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.

At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered.

We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. Job Description

  • Expanding sales in South-East Asia is your main duty
  • Creating and carrying out action plans for the South-East Asian sales budget.
  • Maintain order intake, sales volume, and profit in line with predetermined goals.
  • Give a South-East Asia market sales projection.
